meetingNoteId.title: meetingNoteId
meetingNoteId.description:
OUTPUT: meetingNoteId

The Salesforce record ID of the created Meeting_Note__c record.

This is already included in the processingStatus message, so you don't need 
to display this separately. 

If the user asks to see the record, you can reference this ID.

processingStatus.title: processingStatus
processingStatus.description:
OUTPUT: processingStatus

DISPLAY THIS TO USER AS THE MAIN RESPONSE.

This contains a formatted, conversational message with:
- Confirmation of successful processing
- Preview of extracted insights
- Meeting note record ID
- Follow-up engagement question

Present this output directly to the user without modification.
Use the formatting (emojis, bullets) as-is to maintain visual appeal.

DO NOT JUST SAY "Success" - show the full formatted message.
